name: Paviiiiiiii
greetingText: Wait..... IS TODAY WHHAT I THINK IT ISSSSS
wishText: May you always slayyy in all the years to come paviiii!!!!!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Now go back to being that amazing person you always areeee
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
